title: Issues with LOL opening :(
body:
Hello Riot,

I have been experiencing a weird issue opening the game, I'm on mac and i can't like see the app pop up on my screen like when i press it, it won't load even if i try more than once. it doesn't even show the Launch page i can't do anything. Yesterday i deleted the game then re-installed it, it worked then when i went off it did the same exact thing. What should i do?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try [switching to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#mq4), let me know if this helps.
